title: Supp/jg main lookin for duo
body:
Title says it all. 
Been on a roll with Karma, Brand and Veig lately. 

Can do mages like above, or things like Soraka, Rakan and Janna. (Heals are good for the soul).

Or tanks like Cho, Leo and Taric.

replies.body: I'm a support main and I need someone to duo with too so pls add me if you will ever need a support to duo rank with :D
I may be out of touch with the meta but I dont ever recall brand veig and cho being viable supports. Also it helps to list your jungle picks too.
